Column.Name: Risk Match
Risk Rating
Residual Risk Rating
Residual Risk Value
Treatment ID Array
Column.Formula: COALESCE([Temp Treatment ID], [Treatment ID Array], NULL())

Column.Name: Sort Order
Column.Formula:
LET $open := ARRAY("Open", "Open (Treat)", "Open (Monitor)");
RETURN IF( AND( [Risk Rating] = "Extreme", ARRAY_INDEXOF($open, [Status]) > 0 ), 1,
AND( [Risk Rating] = "High", ARRAY_INDEXOF($open, [Status]) > 0 ), 2,
AND( [Risk Rating] = "Medium", ARRAY_INDEXOF($open, [Status]) > 0 ), 3,
AND( [Risk Rating] = "Low", ARRAY_INDEXOF($open, [Status]) > 0 ), 4,
5 )

Column.Name: Module Raised
Column.Formula: IF( [Parent EFormType] = "Contract", "Contract", [Parent EFormType] = "Plan", "Procurement", [Parent EFormType] = "Project", "Project", COALESCE([Parent EFormType], "N/A") )

Column.Name: Parent Structure

TextCriterion.Text: [Treatment ID] NOT IN ARRAY([Local].[Treatment ID Array])
[Control Description] IS NOT EMPTY
[Status] <> 'Closed' AND [Status] <> 'Draft'
NOT([Risk ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Risk ID Array]))

Binding.Expression: "Go To Related Risk "& [Related Procurement Risk ID]

Label.Text: The record this risk relates to

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", OR( ARRAY_FIRST(EBMS_GET_PARENT_RECORD(EFormType, RecordID)) == "Plan", [Child of Plan] == TRUE ) )
AND( [Risk summary] = NULL(), DB_LOOKUP( "Demo Mode", "Global Settings", HASH("RecordID", 1) ) == TRUE )

Label.Text: Title or brief summary of this risk entry
Unique identifier for this risk entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", ISBLANK([Risk ID]), [Risk Module Active] <> TRUE )

Label.Text: Title or brief summary of this risk entry
Unique identifier for this risk entry
The current status of this risk
Summarise the cause of this risk
The type of risk, or what this is a risk to
Select a category for this risk
The user who raised this risk entry
The user responsible for treatment of or actioning this risk
The user responsible for managing this risk
The department which owns or manages the risk or parent record

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Risk Module Active] <> TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK([Risk ID])), [User in Everyone] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Title or brief summary of this risk entry
Unique identifier for this risk entry
The user responsible for this risk

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Risk Module Active] <> TRUE, NOT(ISBLANK([Risk ID])), [User in Everyone] <> TRUE )
AND( [Register Name] <> "Enterprise Risk Register", [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )

Information.Text: What is the risk ? ie what could happen and why
This will appear in any dropdowns when linking the risk to other entities

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk summary] = NULL(), DB_LOOKUP( "Demo Mode", "Global Settings", HASH("RecordID", 1) ) == TRUE )
AND( ISBLANK([Risk ID]), [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )

Information.Text: Select a Type for this Risk.
What is the risk ? ie what could happen and why
This will appear in any dropdowns when linking the risk to other entities

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk summary] = NULL(), DB_LOOKUP( "Demo Mode", "Global Settings", HASH("RecordID", 1) ) == TRUE )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", NOT(ISBLANK([Risk ID])), [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )

TriggerCustomEvent.TargetRecordsFormula: LET $data:= DB_LOOKUPALL(ARRAY("EFormType", "RecordID"), "Risk Entry", "[RecordID] IN "& DB_ENCODECONSTANT(COALESCE( [Child Risk Ids], ARRAY()))); RETURN ARRAY_DISTINCT($data)

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", NOT(ISBLANK([Risk ID])), [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", NOT(ISBLANK([Risk ID])), [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", NOT(ISBLANK([Risk ID])), [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )
AND( [Navigation] = "Details", NOT(ISBLANK([Risk ID])), [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Select any additional considerations regarding this risk

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [User in Everyone] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Details of any risks secondary to this entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [Option - Secondary Risks] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Details regarding the residual risk which applies to this entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [Option - Residual Risk] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Summary of the contingency plan for this risk entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [Option - Contingency Plan] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Details of the contingency funds allocated for this risk entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [Option - Contingency Funds] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Details of the contingency time allotted for this risk entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [Option - Contingency Time] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Summary of the fallback plans relating to this risk entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [Option - Fallback Plans] = TRUE )

Label.Text: Additional comments or details regarding this risk entry

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Navigation] = "Details", [User in Everyone] = TRUE )

TextCriterion.Text: [RecordID] IN ARRAY ([Local].[Treatment ID Array])
[LineNumber] = 1
[Risk ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Related Risk ID Array])

Binding.Expression: AND( [Navigation] = "Details", [Risk ID] <> NULL(), [Risk Module Active] = TRUE )

Label.Text: What already exists to prevent this risk from occurring?

TextCriterion.Text: [Control ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Control ID Array])

DisplayMessage.MessageTemplate: The control previously selected has been linked to current risk.

TextCriterion.Text: [Treatment ID] IN ARRAY([Local].[Treatment ID Array])

Information.Text: Only accepted Treatments are listed here

Label.Text: What will be done to minimise the impact of the risk?

TextCriterion.Text: [Status] = 'Complete'

Binding.Expression: AND( [Risk summary] = NULL(), DB_LOOKUP( "Demo Mode", "Global Settings", HASH("RecordID", 1) ) == TRUE )

Label.Text: Title or brief summary of this risk entry
The current status of this risk
The user who raised this risk entry

TextCriterion.Text:
CASE -- Check if user in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
-- check if the Risk was raised in relation to a Conflict of Interest declaration WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Conflict of Interest Declaration' AND [Source RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for the parent of this risk WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND( ([Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Contract RecordID]) OR ([Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Significant Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Significant Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID]) ) AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END

CASE -- Check if user in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
-- check if the Risk was raised in relation to a Conflict of Interest declaration WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Conflict of Interest Declaration' AND [Source RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members' THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
-- Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' THEN TRUE
--check that there is no Contract RecordID - if not these users can always access WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS EMPTY AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is in assigned role on the Risk WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Responsible Person] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Risk Coordinator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is an approver on an in progress submission for the parent of this risk WHEN ( STEP TO [Submission] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Approver] AND( ([Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Contract' AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Contract RecordID]) OR ([Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Parent EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Procurement' AND [To].[Parent RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID]) ) AND [To].[Status] = 'Submitted' ) GET COUNT(0) > 0) THEN TRUE
-- Check if parent EForm is Contract WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Contract RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CASE --check that the user is in a role which always has access to the contract WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] THEN TRUE --check that the contract is not restricted, and the user is in one of these roles in addition WHEN [To].[Restricted] <> TRUE AND ( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Read All' ) THEN TRUE
ELSE FALSE END ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- Check if Parent EForm is Procurement WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( CASE -- Check if user has access to parent Procurement WHEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) THEN TRUE
-- Check if the user is assigned to a COI Declaration on the Evaluation WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members' THEN ( STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 ) ELSE FALSE END )
-- check if the Risk was raised in relation to a Conflict of Interest declaration WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Conflict of Interest Declaration' AND [Source RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END

CASE
-- Check if user is in role which always has access WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team' THEN TRUE
-- Check if user is in assigned role on the Risk WHEN CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Responsible Person] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Risk Coordinator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] THEN TRUE
-- Check if parent EForm is Contract WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Contract RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- Check if Parent EForm is Procurement WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
-- check if the Risk was raised in relation to a Conflict of Interest declaration WHEN [Source EFormType] FAST_EQUAL_TO 'Conflict of Interest Declaration' AND [Source RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON [Source RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] ) GET COUNT(0) > 0 )
ELSE FALSE END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
)
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
( STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
)
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
)
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
)
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
( STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
)
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Business Partners'

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
)
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
)
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( DEPT_CONTAINS(GET_USER_DEPARTMENT(CURRENT_USER), [To].[Department]) OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
OR
( STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
)
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Team'

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Owner] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Sponsor] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0
)
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN
( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [To].[LineNumber] FAST_EQUAL_TO 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' END

CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Executive Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator]

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN --this will need further development if client uses in future ( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] = 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) OR ( STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) )
END
CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Administrators' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Procurement Users' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Record Officers'

CASE WHEN [Contract RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN ( STEP TO PARENT [Contract] ON [Contract RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Contract Manager] OR ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Username in Role] AND ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Vendor Managers' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Risk Managers' ) ) ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 )
WHEN [Procurement RecordID] IS NOT EMPTY THEN --this will need further development if client uses in future ( ( STEP TO PARENT [Procurement] ON [Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [To].[RecordID] AND [To].[LineNumber] = 1 AND( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Manager] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Procurement Officer] OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Originator] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) OR ( STEP TO [Conflict of Interest Declaration] ON ( CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [To].[Assignee] AND(CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'Everyone' OR CURRENT_USER IN ROLE 'External Evaluation Panel Members') AND [To].[Procurement RecordID] FAST_EQUAL_TO [Procurement RecordID] ) GET COUNT(1) > 0 ) ) ELSE CURRENT_USER IN ROLE [Originator] END

FieldEntry.Formula: DB_LOOKUP( "Primary Objective", "Risk Type", "[Type] = " & DB_ENCODECONSTANT([Key Consequence Type]) )

FormulaCriterion.Formula: AND( [Impact Type] <> NULL(), [Impact Category] <> NULL(), [Impact Severity] <> NULL() )
